Description: Magical gem; amulet; light green stone (BritMusLab: Jade (Nephrite)); shaped like an axe-head; engraved on obverse: flower with petals enclosing inscriptions; also inscribed on the reverse; also cast.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (504)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G587 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
